resources.string: Sicela ulinde ngenkathi silungisa ifoni yakho.
Ukuze kuqaliswe, faka amadijithi angu-4 okugcina enombolo yokuvikeleka komphakathi kwe-akhawunti yakho yomnikazi:
Ukuze uqalise, faka i-PIN ye-akhawunti yakho:
Sebenzisa inombolo yokuvikela komphakathi esikhundleni salokho

"Ngaphambi kokuthi wenze kusebenze le foni, yenza isipele oxhumana nabo uphinde uvale ifoni yakho endala.
Uma uqala ukwenza kusebenze, sizodlulisela inombolo yakho kule foni siphinde senze kungasasebenzi ifoni yakho endala."
Ukuze udlulisele inombolo yakho yefoni kufoni yakho entsha, ifoni yakho endala kumele ivalwe.
Ifoni yakho ye-Verizon manje iyasebenza. Inombolo yakho ingu-%1$s
Ukusetshenziswa kwedatha yakho manje kukhawulelwe ngenxa yesikhathi sosuku noma umkhawulo wedatha. Kuzomele usebenzise i-Wi-Fi ukuze uqhubeke usethe idivayisi yakho.
Ngenxa yesikhathi sosuku noma umkhawulo wedatha
Awunalo uhlelo olungenantambo lwe-Verizon noma usebenzise konke ukuvunyelwa kwakho kohlelo, sicela uxhumane ne-Verizon
Engeza idatha noma uhlelo lokuzulazula nge-Verizon
Thepha ukuze wenze kusebenze ifoni yakho
Xhumana ne-Verizon ukuze wenze kusebenze ifoni yakho.
Qiniseka ukuthi unesignali enhle (amabha amaningi) uphinde uzame futhi. Uma le nkinga iqhubeka, sicela uxhumane nesevisi yekhasimende ku-(800) 922-0204 ukuze uthole usizo.
Uxolo, sinenkinga yokwenza kusebenze ifoni yakho. Xhumana nesevisi yekhasimende ku-(800) 922-0204.
Inombolo yokuvikela kwezomphakathi ayifani. Sicela uzame futhi.
I-PIN ye-akhawunti ayifani. Sicela uzame futhi.
Uxolo, sinenkinga yokwenza kusebenze ifoni yakho. Xhumana nesevisi yekhasimende ku-(800) 922-0204.
Ukuze wenze kusebenze ifoni yakho, shayela ku-(800) 922-0204 kusukela kwenye ifoni.
Ukuze wenze kusebenze ifoni yakho, landela imiyalo efakwe nefoni yakho entsha noma xhumana nomqondisi we-Verizon Wireless kunhlangano yakho.
Uxolo, sinenkinga yokwenza kusebenze ifoni yakho. Sicela ushayele ku-(877) 807-4646 kusukela kwenye ifoni ukuze wenze kusebenze isevisi yakho ye-4G LTE bese uphinda uyazama futhi.
